Bedfont®ScientificLimited重点介绍Feno Testing在世界卫生组织童年哮喘中的作用2025当世界准备在2025年4月7日观察世界健康日时，Bedfont®ScientificLimited强调了其创新的Nobreath®分数呼出一氧化氮（FENO）设备的早期和准确哮喘诊断的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/bedfontc2ae-scientific-limited-highlighlighlights-feno-testinge28099s-role-in-child-Child-Childhood-childhood-asasthmathmohood-asasthmathmathmathma-asththma-asthmathma-asthmathma-for-world-world-world-world-health-health-day-day-20225.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-highlights-FeNO-testinge28099s-role-in-childhood-asthma-for-World-Health-Day-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6a98e7b-f421-487f-b3e5-4ad5d4e63fb4 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 00:28:00 -0400 Bedfont® Scientific Limited highlights FeNO testing’s role in childhood asthma for World Health Day 2025
Senolotics为更精确的阿尔茨海默氏症提供了希望一份新的研究论文于2025年3月29日发表在《衰老》（老化 - US）上，称为第17卷第3期的封面，标题为“对正常的鼻溶性抑制作用差异性鼻溶剂与Aβ相关胆碱酯酶：对衰老和阿尔茨海默氏病的影响”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/senolytics-offer-hope-hope-for-for-more-presise-alzheimers-wareatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/senolytics-offer-hope-hope-fer-for-more-precise-alzheimers-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59c804db-49A3-4669-BA85-9A6DA3D94961 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 23:50:06 -0400 Senolytics offer hope for more precise Alzheimer's treatments
全球监狱中与较低的结核病诊断有关的大流行中断一项新的研究发现，报告的结核病诊断在整个大流行中始终低于预期，即使监禁率在很大程度上保持一致，并且在大流行早期下降后，普通人群中的结核病检测成功逆转。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/pandemic-distruptions-linked-to-to-to-lower-to-to-lower-tb-diengnoses-in-prisons-prisons-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/pandemic-distruptions-linked-to-to-to-lower-to-to-lower-tb-diengnoses-in-prisons-prisons-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=924d555f1-A675-4744-4744-863C-050B2696C7A4 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 23:45:31 -0400 Pandemic disruptions linked to lower TB diagnoses in prisons worldwide

农村社区面临着更高的心脏病和危险因素与城市地区相比，由美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）资助的一名研究团队发现，影响农村社区中的成年人的心脏病和心脏健康较差，以及可能导致这些差异的因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/rural-communities-face-higher-rates-face-higher-face-face-face-face-of-hend-disease-and-sease-and-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/rural-communities-face-face-higher-rates-face-rates-face-face-face-face-of-hend-disease-and-sease-and-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0971C119-AAC5-478B-8E9D-D1C4369A2B1C Tue, 01 Apr 2025 23:11:39 -0400 Rural communities face higher rates of heart disease and risk factors
在马来西亚医院发现的新的抗生素耐药超级细菌一项新的研究显示，已经发现，在马来西亚医院循环中发现了一种抗生素的“超级细菌”的强烈菌株，对全球公共卫生构成了重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-antibiotic- recesistant-superbug-discovered-in-malaysian-hospital.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-antibiotic-resistant-superbug-discovered-in-malaysian-hospital.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdbcd573-ef1a-41a-41a8-83c3-516dc4357b31 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 23:07:00 -0400 New antibiotic-resistant superbug discovered in Malaysian hospital
研究确定了中风和痴呆的关键预测因子明尼苏达大学医学院的研究团队确定了缺血性中风和痴呆症的有力预测指标，这一发现可能导致患者的结果改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-indistifies-key-predictor-of-stroke-stroke-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-istifies-key-predictor-of-stroke-stroke-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=324f5661-d7db-476a-8182-42aac4ffe7f8 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 22:55:35 -0400 Study identifies key predictor of stroke and dementia

调查显示，人们对酒精的癌症风险的认识提高了自去年秋天以来，公众对饮酒与癌症风险升高之间的联系的认识已经增长，现在有超过一半的美国人说，定期食用酒精会增加您后来患癌症的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/survey-shows-shows-increashes-increashes-evareness-evareness-of-alcole28099s-cancer-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/survey-shows-shows-increast--increashes-evareness-evareness-evarenes-of-alcole28099s-cancer-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7c7c8ecda-ae11-4d3f-8c30-d7c7c74ec946a6 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 22:45:05 -0400 Survey shows increased awareness of alcohol’s cancer risks
